A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I liked the movie\, overall. I think they needed to do more with Poe and I felt Finn was handled poorly - Is he a coward or not? But Luke\, Leia\, Kylo and Rey were all written in ways that made sense for their characters\, I felt. I really hate that the \"hardcore\" fans are crapping on this movie. I wish they could have seen it without expectations\, like I did. Anyway\, go see it and make up your own mind.
